thread.title: Man remains barricaded inside home after assault, RCMP say
thread.title_full: Man remains barricaded inside home after assault, RCMP say

author: cbc
title: Man remains barricaded inside home after assault, RCMP say
text:
A man has barricaded himself inside a home in western Newfoundland following an assault, police said.
Corner Brook RCMP remain on the scene Wednesday morning, after they were called to McIvers around 1:30 p.m. Tuesday on report of a man being assaulted and threatened.
When officers arrived, the 32-year-old suspect had barricaded himself inside his home.
Police don't believe anyone else is inside the home.
Police were called to the white house, seen behind the snowmobiles, Tuesday afternoon following a report of an assault. A man remained barricaded inside the home Wednesday morning, with RCMP stationed outside. (Brian McHugh/CBC)
RCMP set up a perimeter around the home and evacuated people in nearby houses, asking public to stay away from the area.
RCMP has an emergency response team in place as the standoff continues.
The victim of the alleged assault received treatment for minor injuries.
The RCMP's mobile command vehicles set up about one kilometre from a home where a man is barricaded inside in McIvers, on the northern shore of the Bay of Islands. (Brian McHigh/CBC)
